FuncDef: The display ip fib slot all-vpn-instance command displays information about the forwarding tables of all VPN instances on a specified board. The display ip fib slot all-vpn-instance command displays information about the forwarding tables of all VPN instances on a specified board.
CLIs: display ip fib slot <slot-id> all-vpn-instance [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the FIB table in a specified slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays detailed information about the FIB table.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ip fib slot 1 all-vpn-instance verbose
